c74object.name: hoa.space
c74object.digest: A graphic user interface to design ambisonic space.
c74object.description:
hoa.space
allows you to draw spatial filtering and apply gains to the virtual microphones signals.

metadatalist.metadata: HoaLibrary by Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

outlet.name: coeffs
outlet.description: Virtual Microphones Coefficients (you may connect me to the hoa.space~ object).

method.name: list
method.description: Set all the Virtuals Microphones coefficients with a float list. (Set one coefficients with an index and a float)

method.name: (mouse)
method.digest: Click and drag to change values
method.description:
Click and drag on the circle to draw the space of your soundfield.
Click and drag with shift on the circle to retract or expand your soundfield.
Click and drag on the wheel to rotate your soundfield.

attribute.name: nmics
attribute.description: Set the Number of Virtuals Microphones.

attribute.name: bgcolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the Background color.

attribute.name: borderboxcolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the Border Box Color.

attribute.name: circlecolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the Circle color.

attribute.name: cicolorin
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the Circle Inner color.

attribute.name: cishadcolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the Shadow fx color.

attribute.name: harmocolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for the Harmonics color.

attribute.name: miccolor
attribute.description: Sets the RGBA values for Virtuals Microphones color.

attribute.name: shadow
attribute.digest: Activate or de-activate Shadows fx on object.
attribute.description: Activate or de-activate Shadows fx on object.
